title: Tuned To A Dead Channel
description: A collection of 14 dystopian science fiction short stories by 11 international writers.Stories include a steampunk dystopia wherein the captain of an airship searches for his lost love in the ruined cavern of a post-apocalyptic English Channel, two brothers escaping a dystopian city-state where they are treated as slaves, and one mans attempt at rebellion against the company which literally owns him.For fans of Science Fiction everywhere.
author: R.J. Davey
